Movie.Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Movie.About: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Movie.Name: Pulp Fiction
Movie.About: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Movie.Name: Fight Club
Movie.About: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Movie.Name: Forrest Gump
Movie.About: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Movie.Name: Inception
Movie.About: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

Movie.Name: The Matrix
Movie.About: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Movie.Name: Interstellar
Movie.About: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Movie.Name: Gladiator
Movie.About: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Movie.Name: The Departed
Movie.About: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Movie.Name: Whiplash
Movie.About: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Movie.Name: Avengers: Infinity War
Movie.About: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Movie.Name: Avengers: Endgame
Movie.About: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
